publication.title: Carrier-specific dynamics in 2H-MoTe2 observed by femtosecond soft X-ray absorption spectroscopy using an X-ray free-electron laser
publication.author: A. Britz, A. R. Attar, X. Zhang, H.-T. Chang, C. Nyby, A. Krishnamoorthy, S. H. Park, S. Kwon, M. Kim, D. Nordlund, S. Sainio, T. F. Heinz, S. R. Leone, A. M. Lindenberg, A. Nakano, P. Ajayan, P. Vashishta, D. Fritz, M.-F. Lin, and U. Bergmann
